Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest handling the API response when serialising stores the output
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest handling the API response when serialising does not attach anything separately
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest handling the API response when serialising marks the job as completed
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest handling the API response when storing as an attachment does not serialise the output
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest handling the API response when storing as an attachment attaches the response separately
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest handling the API response when storing as an attachment marks the job as completed
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest handling errors when the exception is Hiscox-related serialises the exception
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest handling errors when the exception is Hiscox-related marks the job as completed
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest handling errors when the exception is not Hiscox-related stores an exception summary
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest handling errors when the exception is not Hiscox-related marks the job as failed
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest handling errors when the exception is not Hiscox-related re-raises the exception
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest handling errors when the exception is not Hiscox-related logs a warning
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest simulating the API response with no response available raises an exception
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest simulating the API response with a response available returns the response
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest simulating the API response with a response attached separately returns the response
Insurance::HiscoxApiRequest simulating the API response with a Hiscox exception stored re-raises the exception
